body.p: When using the new Composer endpoint (Composer Integration 2.0) in an Orchestrate process:

ul.li: You cannot send emails with Conga email templates.
The QueryStringField parameter is not supported.

body.p: If the new Composer endpoint 2.0 does not generate Composer documents, use Composer endpoint 1.0 instead.
In the 1.0 or 2.0 integrations with Composer in an Orchestrate process, the DV0 parameter is not supported .
